mountain_view_desc: This setup gives you a layout where each slide showcases the natural beauty of the mountains.
sunny_beach_desc: Enjoy the sunshine and waves with this relaxing beachside view.
city_lights_desc: A modern urban escape with sparkling lights and nightlife around.
serene_forest_desc: Feel the calm of the forest and the whispering winds of nature.
desert_adventure_desc: Explore the endless sands and breathtaking sunset views of the desert.
